channel.title: Commuteless
channel.description: A show about working from home with less stress and more freedom so you can live life on your terms.
channel.itunes:author: Commuteless

item.title: A New Show to Help You Work From Home
item.description:
Welcome to Commuteless, a show about working from home with less stress and more freedom so you can live life on your terms.

In this initial episode we talk about our experience of working from home and discuss our vision for this show. Grab yourself a cup of coffee, lean back in your office chair (or couch), and join us as we start this journey to help you work from home better.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Commuteless, a show about working from home with less stress and more freedom so you can live life on your terms.

In this initial episode we talk about our experience of working from home and discuss our vision for this show. Grab yourself a cup of coffee, lean back in your office chair (or couch), and join us as we start this journey to help you work from home better.
item.author: mail@commuteless.fm (Commuteless)
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Commuteless, a show about working from home with less stress and more freedom so you can live life on your terms. In this initial episode we talk about our experience of working from home and discuss our vision for this show.

item.title: Define Your Spaces for Better Separation and Balance
item.description: Looking at the overall schedule of working from home at a high level. How do we manage everything and get things done? The main premise here is that we divide our time up between work and rest.
item.content:encoded: Looking at the overall schedule of working from home at a high level. How do we manage everything and get things done? The main premise here is that we divide our time up between work and rest.
item.author: mail@commuteless.fm (Commuteless)
